attributes.action: Does parliament have confidence in the economic plans of Prime Minister Truss
attributes.additional_details: I would like them to decide if they have confidence in the economic leadership of Liz Truss
attributes.background: I would like the government to discuss whether they have confidence in the economic plans of the current Prime Minister Truss

rejection.details:
We understand that you would like to see the economic plans of the Government being debated in Parliament but we are not sure what exact action you would like Parliament or the Government to take.

The Government's plans and policies are debated on a regular basis both in the House of Commons and the House of Lords. You can see what policies are being debated when through the Parliamentary Order Paper available here:
https://whatson.parliament.uk/

We currently have a petition open which calls for a vote of no confidence which you might like to sign:

Require a vote of confidence in new Prime Ministers, and an election if lost
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624507
